Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 26 Mar 2019Index ETFs are a duplications of the real index. There are also Value ETFs, Growth ETFs, industry like healthcare/financial/technology ETFs, bonds ETFs, Dividend ETFs and so on. There are all kinds of ETFs not just index ETFs. ETF is just a tool that holds a group of investment products which could be anything.0 comments0
